class.name: FactBase
class.brief_description: A class storing all the facts of the game,
class.description: The facts are stored at paths, and can be easily retrieved from, say, a [StarScript].

method.name: dict_op
method.description: Does an operation deep within a dictionary, by using a path to resolve which subitem to affect.

method.name: get_fact
method.description: Returns the value of a fact.

method.name: is_fact
method.description: Checks whether a certain fact exists.

method.name: set_fact
method.description: Sets a fact to hold a value.
